title: #TaskService.v1_1_0.TaskService

enumDescriptions.Manual: Completed tasks are not automatically overwritten.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

CompletedTaskOverWritePolicy.longDescription: The value of this property shall indicate how completed tasks are handled should the task service need to track more tasks.

DateTime.description: The current DateTime (with offset) setting that the task service is using.
DateTime.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the current DateTime value for the TaskService, with offset from UTC, in Redfish Timestamp format.

LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.description: Send an Event upon Task State Change.
LifeCycleEventOnTaskStateChange.longDescription: The value of this property, if set to true, shall indicate that the service shall send a LifeCycle event to ListenerDestinations registered for such events upon change of task state.

ServiceEnabled.description: This indicates whether this service is enabled.
ServiceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a boolean indicating whether this service is enabled.

Tasks.longDescription: The value of this property shall be a link to a resource of type TaskCollection.

This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

TaskService.description: This is the schema definition for the Task Service.  It represents the properties for the service itself and has links to the actual list of tasks.
TaskService.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a task service for a Redfish implementation.
